trait.name: Bloodied Fury
entries: While {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, the quaggoth has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quaggoth makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The quaggoth casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

spellcasting.name: Psionic Defense (3/Day)
headerEntries: The quaggoth casts {@spell Feather Fall|XPHB} or {@spell Shield|XPHB} in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
